name: Pixel Pathogen
description:
Controls:

Movement - WASD
Spread Virus/ Move Arrow Boxes - Space

How the Viruses Work: Main Virus:

The main virus has a lifespan of 4.

If there is a free space on the grid vertically or horizontally by one space from it and if  life is more than 1, and the player clicks space on the virus controller, it will spread there and decrease its current life down 1.

If there is no place for the virus to spread on the grid vertically or horizontally by one space, and the player clicks space on the virus controller, the virus will not spread and decrease its current life down 1.

If the main virus is on the same grid space as the main virus, the mutated virus will die.

Mutated Virus:

The mutated virus has a lifespan of 4.

If there is a free space on the grid vertically or horizontally by one space from it, and the player clicks space on the virus controller, it will spread there and decrease its current life down 1.

If there is no place for the virus to spread on the grid vertically or horizontally by one space, and the player clicks space on the virus controller, the virus will not spread and decrease its current life down 1.

If the main virus is on the same grid space as the main virus, the mutated virus will die.
